ai-kv9.7:1.1_0: all their minds fall in them.
ai-kv9.7:1.3_0: owing to the all is Recollection of vanity. They converse the recollection of peace. Recollection of pain and sadness. They proceed observe the recollection of peace. ...
ai-kv9.7:1.5_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv9.7:2.1_0: all their minds fall in them.
ai-kv9.7:2.3_0: Does he not have the thought and enjoy it?
ai-kv9.7:2.5_0: ‘There is aroused mind, but you have no placing the mind. You should speak in that way.
ai-kv9.7:3.1_0: all their minds fall in them.
ai-kv9.7:3.3_0: There is no applied and sustained thought.
ai-kv9.7:3.5_0: And there is a state that is free from immersion, but not without placing the mind or keeping it connected.
ai-kv9.7:3.7_0: all their minds fall in them.
ai-kv9.7:3.9_0: Didn’t the Buddha have said that
ai-kv9.7:3.10_0: “Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected. Immersion without placing the mind or keeping it connected.”
ai-kv9.7:3.12_0: The Buddha has spoken of three kinds of concentration:
ai-kv9.7:3.13_0: Immersion with placing the mind and keeping it connected. Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected. Immersion without placing the mind or keeping it connected. ...
ai-kv9.7:3.15_0: The discussion on the teachings is finished.
